item.title: AI Tool Rapidly Flags Patients Ineligible for Thrombolysis
item.description: A large language model identified patients ineligible for thrombolysis with nearly 95% sensitivity. Medscape Medical News

item.title: VTE During Pancreatic Cancer Care Linked to Worse Survival
item.description: Venous thromboembolism is associated with worse survival in patients with pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma receiving perioperative therapy, new data s...

item.title: When Cancer Is Missed in Learning Disability Care
item.description: Missed warning signs and communication barriers mean cancer is often diagnosed late in people with learning disabilities. Medscape News UK

item.title: More Older Adults to Get RSV Vaccine During April
item.description: During April, adults aged 80 and over and care home residents in England will be offered RSV vaccination, alongside eligibility for 75-year-olds. Meds...

item.title: Higher Rates of EOE, Food Allergy Mostly in White Male Teens
item.description: Better adherence to guidelines for food allergen introduction to infants may improve incidence of EoE and food allergy. Medscape Medical News
